gram_extractor module¶

class gram_extractor.SaveFeatures(m)[source]¶

Bases: object

Registers a hook to a nn.Module and saves the activations in a variable

Variables:features (ndarray) – The activations from the layer
hook_fn(module, input, output)[source]¶

The callback function that is registered

close()[source]¶

Remove the hook
